Reviews.Title: Vizio E320i-A2 Worth the money
Reviews.Author: Nicole Fields "Knighteyes"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my bedroom. It was easy to set up, easy to connect to my wifi, easy setting up Netflix, Hulu Plus and Amazon Prime accounts. I don't care for the remote control. Very small and too many buttons. Hard to use in the dark.

Reviews.Title: Crashes on DLNA
Reviews.Author: Carl Gayle
Reviews.Content: The TV shuts off everytime I have tried to use The DLNA feature to send pictures or song from iPad to TV...... very frustrating.

Reviews.Title: vizio 32" 720p
Reviews.Author: from Knoxville
Reviews.Content: Packaged securely, arrived on time, unpacked, put two pieces of stand together, attached, plugged in and then... I placed it in my bedroom where I only have one of those small cable boxes from Comcast, there was no signal unti I set the tv to antenna that I was able to receive the channels. It takes little bit of time for the screen to come on. I love the netflix app plus couple of others. I am happy with the overall performance.

Reviews.Title: Slow
Reviews.Author: Maxim B. Howell "iPhone Developer"
Reviews.Content: Takes 10 seconds to show broadcast channels, 5 seconds after you push the Netflix button for the "Netflix" side panel to show, you then have to confirm you want Netflix (why?) and it then takes 30 seconds to launch Netflix.Picture quality is good, viewing angles are good, but that's *expected* nowadays, the slow performance is annoying and almost unacceptable.

Reviews.Title: It was worth the price
Reviews.Author: Tyree
Reviews.Content: I like this TV a lot, but one thing I don't like about this brand or the seller (either or) is that when the sound is set on surround sound, the right speaker(s) seems to have a short in it. When you turn the volume up, the right side goes in and out, making the sound quality bothersome. The TV was supposed to have been brand new, but I think it was either a refurbished or returned item. That's why I'm not sure who to blame - (the seller or the manufacturer).Another thing is that the USB port can read most file formats, unlike other TVs with USB ports. For some reason it's unable to stream videos from my PC, but I can stream music and pictures though.

Reviews.Title: Great Value in a small TV
Reviews.Author: Paul L Smith
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my office and it works fine. It does all it is supposed to do, but it could be a little faster booting up and the contrast could be a little better.

Reviews.Title: merry christmas
Reviews.Author: alberto salazar
Reviews.Content: well as you may know this product had. some electrical issues,i have to returned li,but the worst is,still did not get it so tell me about it,is over a month.

Reviews.Title: Hd, Excelent, Vizio, Smart
Reviews.Author: Cesar Castellano
Reviews.Content: Excelent HD, Fast FPS, And Excelent Support, It's my First Smart Tv And i Proud Of It. Excelent Purtchase. Recomended

Reviews.Title: good value
Reviews.Author: Michael Todd Tullis "mad reader"
Reviews.Content: This was a quick set up. I plan to get one for my bed. I like the look of the set.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!
Reviews.Author: D
Reviews.Content: Clear picture, excellent quality, fair price. I am pleased with this decision. Also a fair shipping time, everything worked out great with this. What an awesome buy!

Reviews.Title: worth the money
Reviews.Author: janet flisram
Reviews.Content: i got the latest model for a great price! it was only about $50 more than the older model. Shipping was reasonable and arrived within a week. Tv works great and is perfect for our bedroom :)

Reviews.Title: Nice set. Good price
Reviews.Author: Laura Shummon Maass "dave ver 0"
Reviews.Content: Very happy. Came quick. Easy setup. I really like the sound quality. I'm getting old and too much rock n roll has taken IRS toll on my hearing. Image is real good. And the i part (intelligent) is proving to be better than I ever expected.

Reviews.Title: Great T V
Reviews.Author: T. Mitchell ""Savvy Shopper""
Reviews.Content: Great tv at a great price. It was easy to connect to the internet. For a 720P set it still has a great picture.

ProductInfo.Name: Vizio E-Series E320i-A2 32-Inch LED-lit 720p 60Hz Internet TV
